# Examples

In [this directory](../examples), you will find a set of ready-to-use examples prepared by the `python-trueconf-bot` development team.

Below is a list of public projects and scripts implemented using our library:

* [Telegram to TrueConf Chat Migration Toolset](https://github.com/TrueConf/telegram-trueconf-migration).
* [Multiple Bots Example](https://github.com/TrueConf/trueconf-chatbot-example) â€” a single project running several bots at once:
